work.title: Webmaster
work.description: Webmaster - Maintaining the firm’s corporate and recruitment websites

work.title: Specialist, Clients & Markets
work.description: Webmaster - Maintaining the firm’s corporate and recruitment websites, providing training, eMarketing Specialist, and more.

work.title: Web Designer and CSS/jQuery/HTML5 Developer
work.description: Working on general graphic design as well as HTML5 development and UI design, with a focus on mobile devices and responsive design.

projects.title: Instagreen
projects.category: An instagram clone which I'm currently working on. All built using ReactJS and using Google Firebase as backend. Not finished implementing all features, but fully functional! Feel free to go ahead and test it out.

projects.title: Le Savoir
projects.category: An informative website I recently created to offer a more positive view on the current crisis. It started as an exercise to reproduce the look from 'Le Devoir' newspaper from scratch, but I thought might as well add in some interesting content as well. Hence how it was born. All code from yours truly, no CMS, no Bootstrap was used. I coded both HTML and CSS by myself, and then converted it to a React.js app.

projects.title: MEME Generator
projects.category: Recent project I created just for fun while learning React.js. This gave me good bases on the React framework and helped me understand a lot better how props, state, and other features work.

projects.title: MT Ventures
projects.category: On a very tight budget, we needed to build a website in the least amount of time as well. Hence I thought why not code it by hand based on a Bootstrap template? And this is how MT>Version was created. Simple but efficient.

projects.title: SIREV
projects.category: Softvoyage's travel agency search engine needed to be converted from a desktop-only website to a mobile-friendly app. I've done all the coding from scratch by myself with Bootstrap as a base. Used HTML5 and CSS3 at the best of their possibilities at the time to make this fully responsive.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
